ScryingEyeMurder_AD.synopsis: A one-time line triggered when an NPC in the Duergar Camp spots the dead scrying eye.
ScryingEyeMurder_AD.how_to_trigger: Kill the scrying eye in the duergar camp and wait for an NPC to spot it.

ScryingEyeMurder_AD_0.speaker: GROUP_Dwarves, GROUP_Gnomes, Nere
ScryingEyeMurder_AD_0.text: Damn - the scrying eye's closed for good.
